moves.1. e4: We all used this move, back then...
moves.2. f4: This wasn't at all uncommon among us. We'd usually accept on the Black side.
moves.2... Bc5: I decided to vary from the norm, just for the hell of it.
moves.3. fxe5: T. M. seizes the unprotected KP.
moves.3... Qh4+: Anytime I could safely play Q-R5 ch, I figured good things would follow.
moves.5. Ne2: It hardly matters at this point...
moves.5... Qxh1: This gives me a winning material advantage, if the game gets far enough for it to matter.
moves.7. Bb2: Completing his fianchetto and guarding the advanced Pawn.
